function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of SARS-CoV-2 through contact with contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Development of anti-SARS-CoV-2 coating to reduce viability of the virus on solids","Technologies":"Implementation of coatings with virucidal properties on various solid surfaces","People":"General public, healthcare workers, commercial and manufacturing employees","Owner":"Researchers, manufacturers, and regulators"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of the anti-SARS-CoV-2 coatings","Impact":"Limited reduction in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and validation of coatings for long-term virucidal potency","Technologies":"Testing equipment for virucidal activity and durability of coatings","People":"Researchers, manufacturers, and regulators","Owner":"Researchers and manufacturers"},{"Description":"Unknown chemical groups to inactivate SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Inability to develop effective anti-SARS-CoV-2 coatings","Mitigation":"Research and testing to identify chemical groups that effectively inactivate SARS-CoV-2","Technologies":"Laboratory testing and analytical equipment for identification of effective chemical groups","People":"Researchers and scientists","Owner":"Research institutions and government funding bodies"}]}
